faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is your typical project timeline?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary based on scope. Simple websites take 4-6 weeks, while complex applications may take 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during the discovery phase.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer comprehensive managed support packages including 24/7 monitoring, security updates, and performance optimization.
faq.a3: We specialize in modern web technologies: Next.js, React, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, and cloud-native architectures.
faq.q4: Can you migrate our existing system?
faq.a4: Absolutely. We have extensive experience migrating legacy systems to modern architectures with zero downtime.
faq.a5: Security is built into every stage: secure architecture design, code scanning, penetration testing, and ongoing monitoring.
faq.q6: Do you provide training for our team?
faq.a6: Yes, we include knowledge transfer sessions and documentation to ensure your team can maintain the solution effectively.
